list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: fine, dry powder consisting of tiny particles of earth or waste matter lying on the ground or on surfaces or carried in the air.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the car sent up clouds of dust
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Chiếc xe gửi những đám mây bụi

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a quick dust, to get rid of the cobwebs
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một bụi nhanh, để thoát khỏi mạng nhện

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: remove the dust from the surface of (something) by wiping or brushing it.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I broke the vase I had been dusting
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi đã phá vỡ chiếc bình mà tôi đã bị cuốn hút

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: cover lightly with a powdered substance.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: roll out on a surface dusted with flour
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: lăn ra trên một bề mặt bụi với bột
